import axios from'axios';// Create axios instance
const api=axios.create({// The baseURL should be empty or '/' since our endpoints already include '/api/v1'
baseURL:'',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});// API endpoints
const endpoints={// Data endpoints
getPriceData:function(){let timeframe=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:'1h';let limit=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:100;return api.get("/api/v1/data/price?timeframe=".concat(timeframe,"&limit=").concat(limit));},getIndicators:function(){let timeframe=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:'1h';let limit=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:100;return api.get("/api/v1/data/indicators?timeframe=".concat(timeframe,"&limit=").concat(limit));},updateData:()=>api.post('/api/v1/data/update'),// Prediction endpoints
getPredictions:function(){let timeframe=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:'1h';return api.get("/api/v1/predict/".concat(timeframe));},// Signal endpoints
getSignal:function(){let timeframe=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:'1h';return api.get("/api/v1/signals/".concat(timeframe));},getAllSignals:()=>api.get('/api/v1/signals'),// Zerodha endpoints
getZerodhaLoginUrl:()=>api.get('/api/v1/auth/zerodha/login'),zerodhaCallback:requestToken=>api.get("/api/v1/auth/zerodha/callback?request_token=".concat(requestToken)),getZerodhaProfile:()=>api.get('/api/v1/zerodha/profile'),getZerodhaMargins:()=>api.get('/api/v1/zerodha/margins'),getZerodhaHoldings:()=>api.get('/api/v1/zerodha/holdings'),getZerodhaPositions:()=>api.get('/api/v1/zerodha/positions'),getZerodhaOrders:()=>api.get('/api/v1/zerodha/orders'),getZerodhaOrder:orderId=>api.get("/api/v1/zerodha/order/".concat(orderId)),placeZerodhaOrder:orderData=>api.post('/api/v1/zerodha/order',orderData),cancelZerodhaOrder:orderId=>api.delete("/api/v1/zerodha/order/".concat(orderId)),placeTradeFromSignal:tradeData=>api.post('/api/v1/zerodha/trade/signal',tradeData)};export default endpoints;
